products.name: OAuth 2.0 Simplified First Edition (Paperback + PDF)
products.description:
For a limited time, take advantage of this 50% off price, and receive the PDF edition as well!


OAuth 2.0 Simplified is a guide to building an OAuth 2.0 server. Through high-level overviews, step-by-step instructions, and real-world examples, you will learn how to take advantage of the OAuth 2.0 framework while building a secure API.


This discounted price is only available to orders shipped within the US. If you are outside the US, you can order the print book here: http://www.lulu.com/shop/aaron-parecki/oauth-20-simplified/paperback/product-23628969.html

products.name: Uber's Undoing eBook
products.description:
Eli Schiff's definitive story of Uber Design under Travis Kalanick's leadership and beyond. Covering everything from Uber’s ever-shifting philosophy to their icon, logo and typeface design.


Update: All previous and new purchases will get an editable Sketch file with all consecutive Uber icons since the beginning!


More info here: http://www.elischiff.com/blog/2018/10/10/ubers-undoing-part-i-whipping-boy

product_updates_data.message:
A big thanks for your dedication in buying the book early. I have an update for you.

You'll now get access to hand-reproduced Sketch files for every version of the Uber icon—made from scratch. Get a visceral view of what visual decisions were made in the icon construction.

Thanks again for your support.

Eli

PS. If there's any trouble downloading the file, feel free to reach out. (It should be available on the screen where you downloaded the ebook as a separate file).
product_updates_data.name: Uber's Undoing Update
